Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory70.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hey there, o-ji-san!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...Why are you still here? Where are the others?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "It's all sorted! Everyone's ready to hop already!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "BUT! Commandant gave a special order to Nanami! And that's—bringing you out in one piece!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Don't fool around! On top of this horde of Corrupted, I also have to detonate explosives...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "If it's somebody else, then it might be impossible...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'But this is Nanami! So get ready for the wonder of wonders, miracle of miracles!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hold on tight, pops!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Nanami brandishes and swings her weapon in one fell swoop, destroying every Corrupted intending to close in on her.'}
{3: "A steel cable shoots out from Nanami and latches on to Watanabe's arm."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami DIY boom boom pops! FAI—YA!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Haha! Smooth as a criminal! Now we just need to drop those bombs, right?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You're the craziest lass I've ever seen...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Watanabe! Are you alright?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'You all...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Suddenly, an unforeseen Corrupted tears the isolation doors in half with a bladed pair of wings.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'De... tecting... thermal... reaction... purify...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "That's..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Lucia! Look out!', 4: '1'}
